level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you already have a business idea?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Examples: SaaS tool, digital course, coaching service, e-commerce store, consulting, app

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you already have a business name?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Examples: Slack, Notion, Airbnb, Grammarly. Make it memorable and easy to spell.

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you already have a tagline?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Examples: 'Where great work happens', 'Workflow software for the curious'

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you have a one-line description?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: One sentence that explains what your business does. Keep it simple and clear.

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you already know your target audience?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Examples: Solopreneurs, small businesses, Fortune 500 companies, college students

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you know the main problem your business solves?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Example: 'Teams waste 30% of their time on unproductive meetings'

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you know the solution or product you will provide?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: How you solve the problem. Example: 'Smart meeting assistant that records and summarizes'

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you know any competitors or similar products?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Direct competitors or alternative solutions your audience uses now

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you know the brand vibe or style you want?
level1_basic_discovery.hint: Examples: Professional, playful, minimalist, bold, friendly, premium

level1_basic_discovery.question: Do you know your short-term and long-term goals?

level2_foundation_scan.question: Who is your market? (B2B, B2C, niche, mass, local, global)
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Example: 'B2B targeting remote-first startups globally' or 'B2C for busy professionals in US'

level2_foundation_scan.question: How will your business make money? (Revenue model)
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Subscription, one-time purchase, freemium, ads, commission, licensing, etc.

level2_foundation_scan.question: What unique value does your business offer?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Your competitive advantage. Example: '10x cheaper and 5x faster than alternatives'

level2_foundation_scan.question: What are the main features or benefits you plan to offer?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Top 3-5 features that directly solve customer problems

level2_foundation_scan.question: Why is now the right time for this business?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Market trends, technology, regulation, or consumer behavior shifting in your favor

level2_foundation_scan.question: Who are your main customer segments?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Break down by role, industry, company size, or demographic. Prioritize top 2-3.

level2_foundation_scan.question: What are your biggest strengths as a founder?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Skills, experience, network, domain expertise, track record of execution

level2_foundation_scan.question: What challenges or weaknesses do you have as a founder?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Areas where you lack experience, skills, or resources

level2_foundation_scan.question: Why do you want to build this business?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Personal motivation: solve a problem, make money, build something, help others?

level2_foundation_scan.question: What is your estimated starting budget?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Include time, money, and resources needed. Example: '$10k, 6 months full-time'

level2_foundation_scan.question: How strong is your competition? (low / medium / high)
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Few competitors = opportunity. Many = validated market but harder to win.

level2_foundation_scan.question: What are the biggest risks to your business?
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Market risk, execution risk, competition, regulation, technology changes

level2_foundation_scan.question: What limitations do you have? (Time / skill / money)
level2_foundation_scan.hint: Constraints that will affect your business. Be realistic about what holds you back.

idea_dimension.question: How did this idea originate?
idea_dimension.hint: Problem you experienced? Conversation? Market observation? Competitive gap?

idea_dimension.question: Has the problem been validated? If yes, how?
idea_dimension.hint: Customer interviews, surveys, pre-sales? Or still a hypothesis?

idea_dimension.question: How big can this opportunity become?
idea_dimension.hint: TAM (Total Addressable Market). Example: '$5B global market or $500k local market'

idea_dimension.question: What type of innovation is this? (Incremental / Disruptive)
idea_dimension.hint: Incremental: improve existing. Disruptive: entirely new way of doing things

customer_dimension.question: Who are your ideal customers demographically?
customer_dimension.hint: Age, gender, income, location, education, company size, role

customer_dimension.question: What psychographics describe your customers? (Values, mindset, lifestyle)
customer_dimension.hint: What do they care about? Ambitious? Risk-takers? Detail-oriented? Price-sensitive?

customer_dimension.question: What behaviors define your customers?
customer_dimension.hint: How they shop, who influences them, what content they consume, their daily routines

customer_dimension.question: What frustrations do they face?
customer_dimension.hint: Current pain points, wasted time, inefficiency, cost, quality issues

customer_dimension.question: What is their buying power?
customer_dimension.hint: Budget range, who decides purchases, decision timeline, payment preferences

customer_dimension.question: How strong is the market demand for this idea?
customer_dimension.hint: High demand = many customers seeking solution. Low = niche or early market

product_dimension.question: What is the MVP scope?
product_dimension.hint: Minimum features needed to solve the core problem. What's the 1.0?

product_dimension.question: What makes your solution different?
product_dimension.hint: Unique approach, technology, speed, cost, user experience, quality

product_dimension.question: What is your user journey?
product_dimension.hint: From awareness → discovery → trial → purchase → loyalty. Map each step.

product_dimension.question: How does your solution relieve pains?
product_dimension.hint: Which specific frustrations does it eliminate? By how much?

product_dimension.question: How does your solution create gains?
product_dimension.hint: What positive outcomes does it create? More time? Better quality? Lower cost?

product_dimension.question: What makes this business hard to replace?
product_dimension.hint: Defensibility: network effects, data advantage, brand, technology, customer lock-in

competition_dimension.question: Who are your top competitors?
competition_dimension.hint: Direct (same product) and indirect (alternative solutions) competitors

competition_dimension.question: What are their strengths?
competition_dimension.hint: Market share, brand, features, price, customer loyalty, resources

competition_dimension.question: What are their weaknesses?
competition_dimension.hint: Gaps in features, poor UX, high price, slow innovation, lack of support

competition_dimension.question: Where are the market gaps?
competition_dimension.hint: Underserved segments, unmet needs, price points they don't target

competition_dimension.question: What opportunities are others missing?
competition_dimension.hint: Distribution channels, geographies, use cases, customer segments

business_dimension.question: What pricing strategy will you use?
business_dimension.hint: Cost-plus, value-based, penetration, premium, freemium, usage-based, tiered

business_dimension.question: What revenue streams will your business have?
business_dimension.hint: Primary (main product) + secondary (add-ons, premium, services, partnerships)

business_dimension.question: What is your cost structure?
business_dimension.hint: Fixed (salaries, rent) vs variable (COGS, payment processing). Unit economics?

business_dimension.question: How scalable is your business?
business_dimension.hint: Can you 10x revenue with 2x costs? Or does it require proportional hiring?

business_dimension.question: What key metrics will you track?
business_dimension.hint: CAC, LTV, churn, conversion, NPS, MRR, burn rate, runway

business_dimension.question: What is your market entry strategy?
business_dimension.hint: Launch date, target segment first, go-to-market plan, partnerships

branding_dimension.question: What brand tone do you prefer?
branding_dimension.hint: Professional, friendly, bold, playful, minimalist, premium, educational

branding_dimension.question: Which brand archetype fits your business?
branding_dimension.hint: Hero, Rebel, Explorer, Creator, Sage, Caregiver, Lover, Jester, etc.

branding_dimension.question: What color psychology matches your brand?
What logo concept do you imagine?
branding_dimension.hint: Wordmark, symbol, abstract, mascot, geometric, vintage, modern

branding_dimension.question: What themes define your brand story?
branding_dimension.hint: Mission, vision, founder story, origin, values, why you exist beyond profit

founder_dimension.question: What abilities do you have?
founder_dimension.hint: Technical, sales, marketing, fundraising, operations, domain expertise

founder_dimension.question: What is your personality type?
founder_dimension.hint: Are you a builder, visionary, operator, networker, or specialist?

founder_dimension.question: What is your mission as a founder?
founder_dimension.hint: Why are you doing this? Impact you want, problem you're passionate about

founder_dimension.question: What is your long-term vision?
founder_dimension.hint: 5-10 year goal. IPO? Acquisition? Lifestyle business? Category leader?

founder_dimension.question: What is your unfair advantage?
founder_dimension.hint: What do you have that competitors don't? Network, skills, relationships, timing

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a website?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Most businesses do. Landing page, blog, or full site with e-commerce?

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a mobile app?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Only if core experience is better on mobile. Consider mobile-first web first.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a chatbot?
digital_needs_scan.hint: For customer support 24/7. AI chatbots now handle complex queries well.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need workflow automations?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Zapier, Make, n8n for connecting apps. Example: lead → CRM → email → calendar

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a CRM?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Track customers and sales. Pipedrive, HubSpot, Salesforce. Essential for B2B.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need an AI assistant?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Automate content creation, customer support, or internal processes

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a dashboard or admin panel?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Monitor KPIs, manage data, view analytics. Internal tool for your team.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a marketing funnel?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Landing page, email sequences, checkout flow. Tools: Unbounce, ConvertKit, Gumroad

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need an e-commerce system?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Shopify, WooCommerce, or custom. Only if selling products online.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need analytics and tracking tools?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Amplitude. Understand user behavior and conversions.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need internal tools or ERP?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Operations, inventory, project management. Airtable, Monday, or custom systems.

digital_needs_scan.question: Do you need a community platform?
digital_needs_scan.hint: Discord, Circle, Mighty Networks for customer engagement and retention.
